body.name: Belkin 24W Dual Port USB Wall Charger - Fast Charging for iPhone, iPad, Samsung & More - Charging Block for Power Bank, No Cable Included

features: FAST CHARGING: Belkin’s 24W Wall Charger has dual USB ports, with each delivering up to 12W of power to quickly charge your iPhone 15, iPhone 14, iPhone 13, iPhone 12, and countless other devices

DURABLE AND TRAVEL READY: Our charging blocks are designed with durability in mind. Their compact design, with foldable plugs provide a portable and space saving way to safely charge your electronic devices

DUAL PORTS OPTIMIZED FOR MOST DEVICES: This Belkin USB wall charger is optimized to charge your electronic devices at increased speeds. Compatible with Apple iPhone 15, iPhone 14, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 & all Plus, Pro, Max & Mini models.

2-YEAR WARRANTY: This Belkin 24W USB Wall Charger comes with a 2-year limited warranty and a Connected Equipment Warranty (CEW) of up to $2,500, so you can rest assured that your iPhone and other devices are safe and protected

THE BELKIN DIFFERENCE: Pioneer in technology and innovation for over 35 years. Shop our line of rigorously tested iPhone charges, portable chargers, power banks, magsafe chargers, wireless chargers, surge protectors, and more.
body.description: Whether you're at home or on the go, keep all your devices charged with the Belkin 24W Charging Station. With dual ports this wall charger provides a quick and convenient charge for two devices at a time. The Belkin dual USB wall charger has a 2.4 amp output for fast charging of your smartphone or tablet, while the built-in safeguards protect against overcharging and overheating. The compact design with foldable plugs makes it easy to take the 24W USB wall charger on the road for travel or business trips or hitting the road for a weekend getaway, you can rest assured that your devices will stay powered up and ready to go. When paired with lightning cables, or USB C cables (USB Type C cables) the charging block becomes the ideal iPhone charger and Android charger. Compatible with all devices capable of charging with USB A, including Apple iPhone 14, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max and 14 Plus, iPhone 13, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, 13 Mini, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone XR, Galaxy Note 10, Galaxy Note 10+, Google Pixel line, and so many more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a Belkin.
reviews.reviewText: It's more expensive than most, but charges faster and is better built than other units. IMHO, it's worth the extra money if you want something that will last.

reviews.reviewerName: JV Blanco, MArch I, MHsPv, BArch
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent affordable fast charger for usb items
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this multiple usb adapter to accommodate my newly purchased ear buds. It worked perfectly and charged them right up quickly. The second port allowed me to charge my phone simultaneously, which it also did in expedited fashion. Reliable plug, effective. Easy purchase through Amazon, quick delivery through Amazon also. Would purchase again, absolutely! It’s color perfectly matches all of the other accessories associated with my phone, tablet, ear buds and watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Belkin is a great product. Very reliable!
reviews.reviewText: I like to use it for my Apple products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Major Amps and Watts
reviews.reviewText: So nice to have a USB power adapter that isn't stingy with the amps. It IS heavier than other units so that's the only downside except for price. But I was able to power the 2 USB monitors connected to my mini-pc without any problem. Running the monitors off of the pc's internal USB3 ports was funky. Now it's working the way it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a super chunky charger, but in a good way. It has a really nice heft that speaks to the quality. The dual ports and folding prongs are nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charges at the speed you would expect
reviews.reviewText: I tested this charger on my iPhone 14 Pro, and it charges at the same speed as apple's branded 12w charger. So it's faster than the old slow 5w charger, but it's not as fast as the 20w+ fast chargers. It's a good balance of speed and heat control. On my iPhone 14 Pro, it got to 40% after 30 minutes and 76% after 1 hour. This is plenty fast for a slower charger. The phone wasn't noticeably warm like with fast chargers either, which degrades battery health. I did not test charging two devices at once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Fast Charger when using 1 port. Fast when using 2 ports
reviews.reviewText: Very Fast Charger when using 1 port. Fast when using 2 ports
I needed another USB wall charger as it seemed like I was constantly charging one device after another…headset, Fancii mirrors, etc. Now I can charge two devices at once. Works great. Good quality.
充電のスピードが、とにかく速いです。そのため帰宅時でバッテリー残量が少ないようなときでも安心できます！

Bigger than I expected, but fits fine in sockets, not too loose, not too tight. No sparks (thank goodness). I've used it a number of times, including both ports at the same time, and it has not gotten hot at all. I was surprised by how fast it charges my iPhone and Kindle. Fast is a bonus!

reviews.reviewerName: 田中 太一田中 太一
reviews.reviewText: コイルの音も無く、デザインもシンプルで使いやすかった。もうちょっとコンパクトだと差しやすくてスペースを取らないけど、急速だから仕方ないのだろう。
